timeline.message:

timeline.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: Maybe also do an addSuppressed(exeption) here to get a better result from printStacktrace()?

replies.bodyText: did not want to change semantics
replies.author: cdietrich

timeline.author: szarnekow
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,62 @@
+/**
+ * Copyright (c) 2017, 2020 itemis AG (http://www.itemis.eu) and others.
+ * This program and the accompanying materials are made available under the
+ * terms of the Eclipse Public License 2.0 which is available at
+ * http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-2.0.
+ * 
+ * SPDX-License-Identifier: EPL-2.0
+ */
+package org.eclipse.xtext.xtext.generator;
+
+import com.google.inject.Injector;
+
+/**
+ * Generator fragment that wraps another fragment and can be toggled via a
+ * property
+ * 
+ * @author Christian Dietrich - Initial contribution and API
+ * 
+ * @since 2.13
+ */
+public class ConditionalXtextGeneratorFragment implements IXtextGeneratorFragment {
+	private IXtextGeneratorFragment fragment;
+
+	private boolean enabled = true;
+
+	@Override
+	public void checkConfiguration(Issues issues) {
+		if (fragment == null) {
+			issues.addError("The property \'fragment\' must be set.", this);

timeline.author: szarnekow

replies.bodyText: did not want to break current semantics
replies.author: cdietrich

timeline.bodyText: We should probably add more overloads to the BindingFactory - overloads that accept String or Class arguments.
timeline.author: szarnekow
szarnekow
szarnekow

timeline.bodyText:
Copy should probably happen on setContent, too.
Can be simplified to return internalContents.clone
timeline.author: szarnekow

replies.bodyText: No worries :) It would only spare us a few characters in the source code but not improve much.
replies.author: szarnekow

timeline.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: Does that work on windows? Can we add a  note to the path parameter of the constructor?
timeline.author: szarnekow

replies.bodyText: no idea. i assume the path has to be set in a os neutral way
replies.author: cdietrich

timeline.bodyText: This will break when there is a simple name clash.

timeline.bodyText: Unnecessary char escapes in string literal
